title: Presidential Inaugural Addresses 1789-2009
description: "The only thing we have to fear, is fear itself...""Ask not what your country can do for you - ask what you can do for your country..."220 years of some of the most memorable speeches in American history.57 addresses given by 40 Presidents, along with some behind-the-scenes trivia.Join us for this fascinating trip through the history of the United States with the Presidents themselves in their own words.
author: Richard S. Hartmetz
